channel.title: I cant Portforward
channel.description: Whenever I enable the port 5555 (my server port) I get this message[code][25/10/11 4:06 PM]: Launching BrokenX v2... [25/10/11 4:06 PM]: Exception in thread "main" [25/10/11 4:06 PM]: java.net.Bind Exception: Address already in use: bind [25/10/11 4:06 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.Net.bind(Native Method) [25/10/11 4:06 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.ServerSocketChannelImpl.bind(Unknown Sourc e) [25/10/11 4:06 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.ServerSocketAdaptor.bind(Unknown Source) [25/10/11 4:06 PM]: at org.apache.mina.transport.socket.nio.SocketAcceptor.r egisterNew(SocketAcceptor.java:363) [25/10/11 4:06 PM]: at org.apache.mina.transport.socket.nio.SocketAcceptor.a ccess$800(SocketAcceptor.java:55) [25/10/11 4:06 PM]: at org.apache.mina.transport.socket.nio.SocketAcceptor$W orker.run(SocketAcceptor.java:222) [25/10/11 4:06 PM]: at org.apache.mina.util.NamePreservingRunnable.run(NameP reservingRunnable.java:51) [25/10/11 4:06 PM]: at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Press any key to continue . . .[/code] When I disable the port it works fine...WTF PLEASE HELP

item.title: I cant Portforward
item.dc:creator: @blckranger11 blckranger11
item.description:
@blckranger11 wrote:

Whenever I enable the port 5555 (my server port) I get this message[25/10/11 4:06 PM]: Launching BrokenX v2... [25/10/11 4:06 PM]: Exception in thread "main" [25/10/11 4:06 PM]: java.net.Bind Exception: Address already in use: bind [25/10/11 4:06 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.Net.bind(Native Method) [25/10/11 4:06 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.ServerSocketChannelImpl.bind(Unknown Sourc e) [25/10/11 4:06 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.ServerSocketAdaptor.bind(Unknown Source) [25/10/11 4:06 PM]: at org.apache.mina.transport.socket.nio.SocketAcceptor.r egisterNew(SocketAcceptor.java:363) [25/10/11 4:06 PM]: at org.apache.mina.transport.socket.nio.SocketAcceptor.a ccess$800(SocketAcceptor.java:55) [25/10/11 4:06 PM]: at org.apache.mina.transport.socket.nio.SocketAcceptor$W orker.run(SocketAcceptor.java:222) [25/10/11 4:06 PM]: at org.apache.mina.util.NamePreservingRunnable.run(NameP reservingRunnable.java:51) [25/10/11 4:06 PM]: at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Press any key to continue . . . When I disable the port it works fineâ€¦WTF PLEASE HELP
